summary.span: 定义路由行为，此行为用于配置目标终结点、筛选器和路由过程中将要使用的筛选选项。

span.span: Defines the routing behavior, which is used to configure the destination endpoints, filters and filtering options to be used during routing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将注册路由服务使用的所有运行时组件，包括通道初始值设定项、 和 。The registers all of the run-time components used by the routing service, including the channel initializer, , and the .
